## EthersLiquity.getTroves() method

Get a slice from the list of Troves.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTroves(params: TroveListingParams, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<UserTrove[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [TroveListingParams](./arth-lib-base.trovelistingparams.md) | Controls how the list is sorted, and where the slice begins and ends. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./arth-lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[UserTrove](./arth-lib-base.usertrove.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Pairs of owner addresses and their Troves.
